answers.answer: If you use insulin to eat what you want and use insulin to cover over eating you will gain weight.  if you use too much insulin you can get hyposthat said ive had no other side effects i have been on insulin for 17 years

question: I've recently started taking Novorapid Insulin three times daily, trulicity once a week and Lantus once a night before bed.
title: Anyone have any side effects with taking insulin for Tyler 2 diabetes?
